No. 315, No. 316,

Misc.

Misc.

Rivera v. United States; and Guerra v. United States. Leon B. Polsky for petitioner in No. 315, Misc. Jerome J. Londin for petitioner in No. 316, Misc. Solicitor General Cox, Assistant Attorney General Miller, Beatrice Rosenberg and Jerome M. Feit for the United States.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied.

Reported below: 334 F. 2d 138.
